symptoms_progression.discription: The patient started experiencing a mild fever 3 days ago, followed by a persistent cough and difficulty breathing.

questions.question: Question 1
questions.discription: Do you have any other symptoms, such as body aches, fatigue, loss of taste or smell, or chest pain?
questions.answer: No, I do not have those symptoms.

questions.question: Question 2
questions.description: Have you had any recent exposure to someone who tested positive for COVID-19 or was feeling unwell with similar symptoms?

questions.question: Question 3
questions.description: Do you experience any pain or tightness in your chest, or is the difficulty breathing more of a feeling of shortness of breath without chest discomfort?
questions.answer: Sometime i have shortness of breath without chest discomfort
